content: Is there a tool for reducing an ICE? I just ran into one and I'm not sure if it's new but I definitely cannot share all 20k LOC that are in this codebase.
Alas. There have been talks of such a tool, but its quite complicated undertaking to actually implement one.
I'm not surprised. Thanks anyway, I guess I'll just try to check out some commits before those being blamed for other ICEs to try my luck

Btw there is this tool that you might be able to use: https://github.com/perses-project/perses

I haven't personally tried it, but it found ICEs in some of the code that pushed to rust
